name: Space Rage (Bryan Rumsey)
description:
Alien's have invaded Earth, personally destroying everything in your life. With nothing left to live for, you vow to eradicate those that have taken everything from you. Take the fight to the aliens as you not only exact personal revenge, but protect your planet while doing so.

Features
--------------------
- A Story Mode length designed with shorter play time in mind
- 5 Original Songs written for the game by obscure composer Bryan Rumsey
- Invincibility Mode always available with zero guilt introduced by using it
- Voice Over work by Sean Childers

Changelog can be found here
